newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Chile's Iansa started.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Chile's Iansa started.

text.p: -- Santander Investment said on Friday it had started coverage of Chile's Industria Azucarera Nacional SA (Iansa) with a buy rating.
-- Analyst Heinrich Lessau wrote in a report that Santander expected the agribusiness company to report earnings per share of 7.8 pesos in 1996, 9.5 pesos in 1997 and 11.1 pesos in 1998.
-- "The 12- to 18-month target price of 112 pesos implies 23.1 percent upside from the current level," he wrote. Iansa is Chile's sole sugar producer.
-- The company's shares were up 1.10 to 92.10 in Santiago trade.
